original_text: Forasmuch therefore as your treading is upon the poor, and ye take from him burdens of wheat: ye have built houses of hewn stone, but ye shall not dwell in them; ye have planted pleasant vineyards, but ye shall not drink wine of them.
korean_text: 너희가 힘없는 자를 밟고 그에게서 밀의 부당한 세를 거두었은즉 너희가 비록 다듬은 돌로 집을 건축하였으나 거기 거주하지 못할 것이요 아름다운 포도원을 가꾸었으나 그 포도주를 마시지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: Forasmuch therefore as your treading is upon the poor
and ye take from him burdens of wheat
ye have built houses of hewn stone
but ye shall not dwell in them
but ye shall not drink wine of them
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그것들의 포도주를 마시지 못할 것이다
